overview: Network television executive Gavin hopes to reunite celebrated Hollywood stars Piper Grayson, Kate Westbourne, and Addie Holden in a TV special after their 1960s movie musical Boy Crazy is re-released. Though the three women share the same agent, Gavin's seemingly insurmountable obstacle is that they all cannot stand each other.
tagline: They swore they'd never work together again - their shocking reunion - still throwing tantrums, still stealing headlines, still making producers cry!
title: These Old Broads
